name: Solar System (itch) (OmnibenGames)
description:
This is my model of our Solar System. It's a 3D model and the camera focus changes when you click any celestial body. This model is not done according to scale, in terms of distance, size, speed of rotations and revolutions, etc. This model has the following elements:

  1. The Sun
  2. Mercury
  3. Venus
  4. Earth (and its moon) 
  5. Mars (along with Phobos and Deimos)
  6. Jupiter (with two of its moons: Ganymede and S2003 J2(shortened to J2) 
  7. Saturn (without its rings)
  8. Uranus
  9. Neptune 
  10. Pluto

Credits

Created by Akondu Okpe
